message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.SE

The paper focuses on the security and privacy aspects of Bitcoin, which are major concerns in the field of computer security. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper discusses the underlying technologies of Bitcoin, such as blockchain and distributed consensus protocol, which fall under the categories of cs.DB (Databases) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also discusses the feasibility and robustness of security solutions, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper discusses the anonymity and privacy-related threats to Bitcoin users, which falls under the category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
